thread.title: 'The Martian' Wins Weekend Box Office With $55 Million
thread.title_full: 'The Martian' Wins Weekend Box Office With $55 Million

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'The Martian' Wins Weekend Box Office With $55 Million
text:
Comments The outer space movie topped this weekend's box office with an estimated $55 million, beating last week's champion 'Hotel Transylvania 2'. 
Ridley Scott's astronaut movie " The Martian " rocked this weekend's box office, launching to an estimated $55 million from 3,831 theaters. The Matt Damon -starrer almost defeated " Gravity " to nab the biggest October opening of all time. Although "The Martian" now has the second-biggest October opening of all time, there's still a chance that when final numbers come, it can top the record holder, "Gravity", which opened to $55.8 million in 2013. "Science is at the heart of 'The Martian' and is presented in a very accessible way," said Fox distribution chief Chris Aronson. "This movie has the potential to get people excited about our space program again." Last weekend's champion, " Hotel Transylvania 2 ", was down 32 percent, earning approximately $33 million for a domestic total of $90.5 million. The Dracula animated movie still shone, placing number two in the chart. This weekend's other new wide release, " Sicario ", brought in around $12 million as it expanded from 59 to 2,620 theaters. The R-rated drug cartel action movie secured the third place, coming behind "The Martian" and "Hotel Transylvania 2". Nancy Meyers' comedy movie, " The Intern ", added another $11.6 million for a domestic total of $36.5 million in its second weekend. Meanwhile, the latest installment of " The Maze Runner " movie series, " Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials ", rounded out the top five with approximately $7.6 million for a domestic cume of $63.2 million.
